item.floocraftft.craftable: Ye can craft wi' this one
gui.floo_sign.title: Name yer Ship
gui.floo_sign.name_in_use: Some scallywag's pilfered that name already
gui.peek.out_of_range: Peek failed: ye can't see that far away from the crow's nest
gui.peek.done: Climb down from the crow's nest
gui.teleport.title: Pick a Port
config.client.dizzy: If true, ye be forgettin' yer sea legs when ye disembark.
config.client.flash: If true, there be a blindin' green or magenta flash when ye travel.
config.common.deplete: If true, ye can only travel a few times with each pinch of Traveller's Snuff.
config.common.item_tp: If true, yer dropped plunder WILL disappear somewhere else if it touches St Elmo's Fire. You won't lose yer Snuff though.
config.common.mob_tp: As with the landlubbers, but for every sort of common beast ye can think of. You won't lose yer Snuff though.
config.common.villager_tp: If true, them big-nosed landlubbers MIGHT use a fireplace fer travel. You won't lose yer Snuff though.
config.common.safety: When ye step out of a fireplace, the fire will be safe for this many ticks before turnin' back to normal and settin' yer stern alight.
